scripts.commit_deploy: git add deploy -A && git commit -m "deploy files at `date`" -n > /dev/null 2>&1; exit 0
scripts.ghpages: git subtree split --prefix deploy/ -b gh-pages && git push -f origin gh-pages:gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run commit_deploy && npm run ghpages
